author: author

edit.sureToCancelTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete the expense? It can be restored in the list of expenses.
edit.txCanceled: The expense has been cancelled. You can restore it to include in the calculation.

chat.getProDescription: Unlimited addition and more with Billy Pro

userBalance.title: Balance
userBalance.calcInCurrency: Billy calculated the total amount of all debts and showed it in currency – {{currency}}
userBalance.calcInMyCurrency: Billy calculated the total amount of all debts and showed it in your currency – {{currency}}
userBalance.originalOtherTab: You can view the debts in original currencies on the next tab.
userBalance.toChangeYourCurrency: To change your currency, go to the
userBalance.how: Billy recalculates debts to minimize the number of transfers. For example: if someone paid for you, and you paid for another person, Billy will redistribute the amounts so that you pay directly to the one who really needs it, skipping unnecessary steps.

chatBalance.title: Chat Balance
chatBalance.description: Only participants with debts are shown here — whether they owe or are owed
chatBalance.sortAsc: Sort by Who Owes the Most
chatBalance.sortDesc: Sort by Who Is Owed the Most
chatBalance.allSettledUp: All settled up in this chat

chatSettings.title: Chat Settings
chatSettings.makeBillyAdminTitle: Make Billy an admin in the chat so it can function correctly:
chatSettings.makeBillyAdminFeature1: Delete messages with spending details to avoid spamming the chat
chatSettings.makeBillyAdminFeature2: Pin the spending menu for quick access
chatSettings.makeBillyAdminFeature3: Add participants to mini app as they join the chat
chatSettings.onlyAdmin: Only a chat admin can do this
chatSettings.usersCanMakeAdmin: The following users can make Billy an admin:
chatSettings.activeUsersDescription: «Split the expense among all users» will be distributed among active users. To add new ones, invite them to the chat

allSettledUp: You are settled up in this group
featureSoon: This feature will be available soon
analyzeCategories: Analyze each category and manage your finances
chatTypeDescription: For personal budget you have monthly limits, for sharing bills you have cashback options

paywall.featureCategories: Defining and analyzing expenses by category
paywall.featureCashback: Cashback for paying for shared expenses

voiceLimitMessage:
You have reached your limit for recording voice and text expenses in this chat (4 free entries per user). Purchase Billy Pro to continue.

You can still add expenses via the 'Add Expense' button in the app.
slide1_text: Just add me to your chat to start using the bot. Expenses can be recorded both by text and voice messages! I will find these messages in the chat and take everything into account.
slide2_title: Tired of transferring money to each other after each bill?
slide2_text: It's easy to write about the expense in the chat - Billy will see it and write it down in history. It will sum up all the expenses and tell who owes whom how much.
slide3_title: No one wants to take responsibility for paying the group bills?
slide3_text: Pay for friends - get group cashback in Billy with real money!
slide4_title: Won't get up from the table until we count who ate how much?
slide4_text: Write down the expense now, and your friends will fill in their shares later.
slide5_title: The most convenient way to manage a group budget!
slide5_text1: Simplify settle up by recalculating all expenses into the selected currency. This is especially true when traveling!
slide5_subtitle2: The bot cleans its chat messages
slide5_text2: Billy cleans up all service messages in the chat, leaving all important information in the application interface
slide6_title: Benefits with a Billy Pro subscription
slide6_subtitle1: Unlimited input of expenses by voice or text
slide6_text1: While free version, there are only 4 voice or text recordings available in shared chats. Besides, you can always enter expenses inside the bot without restrictions.
slide6_text2: Billy will automatically select a category for each bill, and will provide an analysis
slide6_text3: Get cashback while paying for others

userSettings.title: Profile settings
userSettings.currencyDescription: Settings apply only to your profile. Expenses are displayed in the selected currency in the chat and converted to your profile currency.
userSettings.notifyDescription: Duplicate messages about my expenses to a private chat with Billy

payoffMethods.title: Ways to Receive Funds
payoffMethods.cardsWalletsDescription: Your Preferred Payoff Methods for Receiving Money
payoffMethods.messagePlaceholder: Hi! Please send the money to [add your details]. Thank you
payoffMethods.messageDescription: If you don’t have the necessary cards or wallets, leave a message. It will be shown during the refund process

error.forbidden: Oh, I wasn't allowed to show you these numbers. Most likely because you are not in the chat.
error.other: Something didn't work, but I'm already fixing it. Try refreshing the page.
